title: Make and Use a Bola
brief: Create a weighted cord weapon effective for capturing running game or low-flying birds.
steps: Step 1: Create three cords of equal length with weights attached to each end.
Step 2: Tie the three cords together at their center points with a strong knot.
Step 3: To use: hold the bola by the center knot.
Step 4: Twirl it above your head to build momentum.
Step 5: Release the center knot so the bola flies toward your target.
Step 6: The weighted cords will separate and wrap around the target to immobilize it.
warnings: Practice in an open area away from people - the weights can cause injury.
Ensure all knots are secure before use to prevent weights from flying loose.
Most effective against flocks of birds or small running animals.
